name: Reincarnation
description:
Team Name :-
Savage7s

Controls :-
Use Space To  Jump/Vault , LCTRL To Slide,Left Mouse Click To Shoot.

Gameplay Instructions :-
Avoid The Obstacles Shoot The  Zombie and reach the end point.

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.
-The font used for in game text, and the logo font.

-Character Model & Animation From Mixamo.

-Other Assets are downloaded from unreal marketplace and  MegaScan
